name: Salamangreat Skunch
text: If you control a "Salamangreat" Ritual Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this is sent to the GY for the Summon of a "Salamangreat" monster: You can add 1 "Salamangreat" Ritual Monster or Ritual Spell Card from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Salamangreat Skunch" once per turn.
